content.rendered:
Balconies      Gates      Railings      Handrails      Staircases & Balustrades

Balconies
Gates
Railings
Handrails
Staircases & Balustrades

We specialise in both the commercial and residential sectors and our Railings and Fencing are handcrafted and designed in the UK by skilled Italian specialists of metal work. We believe in quality, for this reason, we only use the finest materials to guarantee the durability of our products.

Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

Big Ferro have many years of experience in designing, supplying, fabricating and installing metal railings in and around London. Our team are fully accredited and always put safety at the forefront of our business. Our products are bespoke and made to measure and we have a wide range of finials that you can choose from in order to give your railings the finishing touch it deserves. Whether you need to mount them on top of a wall or fix them to the floor… we can help.

Follow Us!

We nurture our customers from design & fabrication
We nurture our customers from design & fabrication
